attributes.action: Allow medicine prescriptions to be free to those who has ongoing medical problems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All those patients who suffer from progressive and ongoing medical conditions have to pay out each month for medications that keep them alive or to stop them from having severe pain. If a medication is a requirement then these people should not have to pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
